summary: The customer is interested in downgrading their service plan with Contoso Wireless. The agent informed them that when they downgrade, they may experience a decrease in data usage and certain features such as streaming services and hotspot access. The agent also suggested ways to save money such as signing up for autopay and bundling services together. Lastly, the agent mentioned that it may take up to 24 hours for the changes to take effect and to keep track of their data usage.
